thread.title: Lawmakers Focus on Obama-Era Discipline Policies After Florida School Shooting

author: wsjcom
title: Lawmakers Focus on Obama-Era Discipline Policies After Florida School Shooting
text:
Nikolas Cruzâ€™s educational history is drawing scrutiny in Washington, as questions linger over whether his troubled behavior should have sparked an intervention before he allegedly shot and killed 17 people at a Parkland, Fla., high school.

Conservative lawmakers are stepping up attacks against Obama-era disciplinary guidelines designed to keep students out of the criminal-justice system. In Broward County, where Parkland is located, school officials have refuted the notion that a school program to steer more juveniles away...
